bibl.title: The Hellenistic Economy: Indirect Intervention by the State.
bibl.note: The main forms of indirect intervention: money, wars, taxation, technology, land structures, temples, urbanisation.

bibl.title: Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity

bibl.seg: FORABOSCHI Daniele, The Hellenistic Economy: Indirect Intervention by the State.
Elio LO CASCIO and Dominic W. RATHBONE (Edd.), Production and Public Powers in Classical Antiquity = Cambridge Philological Society. Suppl. 26 (Cambridge, 2000) pp. 37-43.
The main forms of indirect intervention: money, wars, taxation, technology, land structures, temples, urbanisation.
